name: Golem (itch) (Manoman017)
description:
Golem is a top down horde mode bullet hell where you can take control of your enemies. Play as six unique characters and survive as long as you can. Don’t let your swap bar fill up all the way or its game over!

KNOWN ISSUES:

- Play again button can crash the game

- Intermittent slowdowns when lots of enemies are on screen

- Audio issues (HTML version)

Controls:

WASD to move

Mouse to aim

Left Click to Attack

Right Click to Special (if your golem has one)

If you are above the limit bar:

Press space to begin swapping

Place cursor over enemy

Release space to confirm swap

Some enemies are shielded by a white circle that needs to be broken before you can swap to them.

Not playable on Safari.

Download is available for PC.

Art by https://penusbmic.itch.io/
